title: Deprecated — deprecated
text: column company_id now deprecated toy_*companies(). latest data uses companies_id available automatically update tiltIndicator package. toy_emissions_profile_products() toy_emissions_profile_upstream_products() deprecated favor toy_emissions_profile_products_ecoinvent() toy_emissions_profile_upstream_products_ecoinvent(), respectively.

title: tiltToyData 0.0.0.9011 (2024-01-17)
text: Change license GPLv3 (39025a8).

title: tiltToyData 0.0.0.9010 (2024-01-15)
text: New toy datasets tiltIndicatorAfter v0.0.0.9016 (#30). Note datasets don’t match new *products_ecoinvent() ’s stepping stone towards matching datasets since makes upcoming update relatively smaller change.

title: tiltToyData 0.0.0.9009 (2024-01-13)
text: toy_emissions_profile_products() toy_emissions_profile_upstream_products() now deprecated (#26). continue work ’ll get message warning instead use toy_emissions_profile_products_ecoinvent() toy_emissions_profile_upstream_products_ecoinvent(), respectively.

title: tiltToyData 0.0.0.9008 (2024-01-12)
text: Update toy_emissions_profile* datasets (#25). Now activity_uuid_product_uuid toy_emissions_profile_any_companies() also exists toy_emissions_profile_products_ecoinvent() toy_emissions_profile_upstream_products_ecoinvent().

title: tiltToyData 0.0.0.9007 (2024-01-11)
text: One update two new datasets (#19): New version toy_emissions_profile_any_companies(). New datasets toy_emissions_profile_products_ecoinvent() toy_emissions_profile_upstream_products_ecoinvent() pretend products exist ‘Ecoinvent’ database. toy datasets actually products exist ‘Ecoinvent’ ‘Europages’. Features: Fake companies_id. Fake activity_uuid_product_uuid. Random mapping fake activity_uuid_product_uuid columns. Noisy *co2_footprint, jittered right 50%-100% average. Compared previous version toy_emissions_profile_any_companies(), new version gains three columns: country, ei_activity_name, `main_activity. Compared toy_emissions_profile_products(), new dataset toy_emissions_profile_products_ecoinvent() gains one column: ei_geography. Compared toy_emissions_profile_upstrem_products(), new dataset toy_emissions_profile_upstream_products_ecoinvent() gains four columns: ei_activity_name, ei_geography, input_ei_activity_name, input_reference_product_name.

title: tiltToyData 0.0.0.9005 (2023-12-07)
text: Add single quotes around values *isic* (#17).

title: tiltToyData 0.0.0.9004 (2023-11-23)
text: Retire companies$company_id (#11).

title: tiltToyData 0.0.0.9003 (2023-11-17)
text: Rename company_id companies_id backward compatible way (#10). column company_id now deprecated toy_*companies(). latest data uses companies_id available automatically update tiltIndicator package.

title: tiltToyData 0.0.0.9002 (2023-08-29)
text: files “emissions_profile_products.csv.gz” “emissions_profile_upstream_products.csv.gz” gain columns tilt_subsector input_tilt_subsector, respectively (@kalashsinghal #6). columns come raw data tiltIndicator v0.0.0.9088 (.e. right toy datasets moved tiltToyData.

title: tiltToyData 0.0.0.9001 (2023-08-21)
text: New helpers read toy datasets (#1).
